name: Salesforce
description: This app implements actions to manage objects on Salesforce

actions.description: Validate connection using the configured credentials
Run a query using the SalesforceObject Query Language

actions.verbose: In order to get a list of objects, you must specify the name of a list view. By leaving the view_name blank, this action will instead return a a list of valid names in the summary. Also, this action will only work if the specified object has a list view. If it does not, you could use the run query action instead.

view_name.description: Unique name of a list view

example_values: Created a list of valid view names
Successfully created a list of Contact objects

actions.description: Get info about a Salesforce object
actions.verbose: If you have custom fields added to an object, then it's possible that they wont show up, and you will need to manually type the datapath in the playbook editor.
If you have custom fields added to a case, then it's possible that they wont show up, and you will need to manually type the datapath in the playbook editor.
